main event: Two round objects with red, white, and blue lights were spotted over Miami Beach, Florida in November 1957.
interesting points: The objects were about 4 inches in diameter and passed at an aircraft's length.
The objects had red, white, and blue lights.
The objects passed at 10 o'clock and then disappeared.
The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes.
The objects could not be definitively identified and were considered possibly unidentifiable.
sighted object: two round objects with red, white, and blue lights
